name: TV Mixture Quiz: TV Shows In Other Words | 15 Questions

questions.explanation:
Queer As Folk.

	U.S. version, starring: Gale Harold, Hal Sparks, Randy Harrison, Peter Paige, Scott Lowell, Sharon Gless, Michelle Clunie, and Thea Gill.

The Practice & The Practise.

	Starring: Dylan McDermott, James Spader, Lara Flynn Boyle, Kelli Williams, Camryn Manheim, Steve Harris, Marla Sokoloff, Radha Mitchell, Michael Baddalucco, and Ron Livingston.

Growing Pains.

	Starring: Alan Thicke, Joanna Kerns, Kirk Cameron, Tracey Gold, and Jeremy Miller.

Saved By The Bell.

	Starring: Mark-Paul Gosselaar, Tiffani Amber Thiessen, Mario Lopez, Elizabeth Berkley, Lark Voorhies, Dustin Diamond, and Dennis Haskins.

Boy Meets World.

	Starring: Ben Savage, Rider Strong, Danielle Fishel, Will Friedle, and William Daniels.

One Tree Hill.

	Starring Chad Michael Murray, James Lafferty, Hilarie Burton, Sophia Bush, Bethany Joy Lenz, and Moira Kelly.

Full House.

	Starring: John Stamos, Bob Saget, Dave Coulier, Candace Cameron, Jodie Sweetin, Lori Loughlin, and Mary-Kate and Ashley Olsen.

Sex and the City.

	Starring: Sarah Jessica Parker, Kim Cattrall, Kristin Davis, Cynthia Nixon, Chris Noth, John Corbett, David Eigenberg, and Kyle MacLachlan. Some people mistenkly have thought it was called Sex IN the City.

Bewitched & Charmed.

	'Bewitched' stars: Elizabeth Montgomery, Dick Sargent, and Dick York. 'Charmed' stars: Alyssa Milano, Holly Marie Combs, and Rose McGowan.

Family Matters.

	Starring: Jaleel White, Reginald VelJohnson, Jo-Marie Payton-Noble, Darius McCrary, and Kelly Shaygne Williams.

Angel.

	This was a spin-off from "Buffy the Vampire Slayer" starring David Boreanaz and Charisma Carpenter.

questions.correct: Love Cruise & The Love Cruise & Love Boat & The Love Boat
questions.explanation:
Love Cruise & The Love Cruise & Love Boat & The Love Boat.

	'Love Cruise' is starring no one you would have ever heard of. 'Love Boat' is starring: Gavin MacLeod, Bernie Kopell, Fred Grandy, and Ted Lange.

The Weakest Link & Weakest Link.

	Hosted by Anne Robinson.

The Tonight Show & Tonight Show.

	Jay Leno took over as host in 1992, after Johnny Carson retired.
